ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Digest Number 1064
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have recently upgraded my video card to a GeForce2 GTS from a Voodoo3 3000.  The Voodoo3 was fine except some spell effects would lag me down, most
ygData.messageBody:
>
I have recently upgraded my video card to a GeForce2 GTS from a Voodoo3
3000. The Voodoo3 was fine except some spell effects would lag me down,
most notably the AOE rain type spells. So I upgraded. The visual quality
on the GeForce2 isn't quite as good; the ground ahead gets kind of grainy
and/or swimmy and in general things in the distance don't look as good, but
I don't get graphical lag at all any more.
>

You can fix the swimmy textures up in a second by switching on Full Screen
Anti-Aliasing. You don't have to turn it up very high; halfway or one notch
less should be more than enough to clear up jaggies and freaky ground
textures. It did on mine while I had the Prophet 2 64MB and a PIII 500.
